resources.string: User not available\n\nThe user/device you are trying to reach is not available at this time.
Call declined\n\nThe remote party declined to communicate with users subject to data retention.
Welcome to Silent Circle in partnership with Vertu

resources.string: I have read and accepted the privacy policy and terms and conditions from Silent Circle
I would like to receive exclusive news and invitations from Services
Two-factor authentication is enabled. Please enter an authentication token below.
Provisioning Error: You have specified an incorrect authentication token.
An enterprise server could not be located, or could not be authenticated, for the %s domain
The date of the certificate is invalid
The certificate is not yet valid
The certificate authority is not trusted
Always prefer non-NIST algorithms if available: Twofish, Skein, and Bernstein curves.
Prefer maximum security over a nicer UI; prevent Android from saving screen images for multitasking, and disable screenshots.
Never allow detailed metadata, messages, attachments, or call audio to be retained by your organization or by other organizations.
Never allow detailed metadata, messages, attachments, or call audio to be retained by this device and uploaded to a server for retention
Refuse to communicate with other users who are subject to data retention and whose devices are retaining detailed metadata, messages, attachments, or call audio for upload to a retention server.
"You should verbally compare the authentication code with the person you are calling. If it doesn’t match, it indicates that someone may have intercepted the call."
Connection Error. Please close and call again.
The person you are calling needs to update their Silent Phone application to the latest version.
Application Error. Please re-install Silent Phone.
Read access to Silent Circle key manager
Write access to Silent Circle key manager
An alternate email address is necessary to receive important updates and benefits regarding your account.
As a Vertu Customer you enjoy 12 months of complimentary access to Silent Circle’s encrypted communications services.
An email address is necessary to receive important updates and information regarding your account.
Account creation - server sent wrong data format:
Account creation - server returned wrong data.
Your Silent Circle subscription is expired.
This license code doesn\'t appear to be valid. If you are having trouble with activating your Blackphone and Silent Circle accounts, please contact customer support at support@blackphone.ch

This license code appears to have been activated already. If you are resetting your phone, simply log into your Silent Circle account normally. If you are having trouble activating your Blackphone and Silent Circle accounts, please contact customer support at support@blackphone.ch
Couldn\'t read details for the requested call.
All your call records will be deleted.
Cannot open key store. The password or PIN you entered is incorrect, please try again.
Password change failed. Using existing password.
Old password is wrong. Locking key store.
Old pin is wrong. Locking key store.
Passwords do not match. Please check.
Tap on screen to toggle video control buttons. \n\nTouch small preview window to move it.
Start Silent Phone during the device\'s startup procedure.
Show the tutorial screens again in case you missed them.
Show all previously dismissed warnings again.
If Silent Phone detects a restrictive firewall, try extra hard to complete your call.
Use a more reliable but lower-quality method of connecting the call audio, which may be needed on particularly bad networks.
Play low tone if no media packets are arriving. If heard often, you or your partner may want to change networks.
Automatic control of echo canceler. If not selected the echo canceler is always active
Minor software errors that don\'t affect your experience are hidden by default.
If you aren\'t a developer, don\'t check this!
Set the SSL debug level. 0 means debugging off, 4 means full verbose debugging.
Set the ZINA debug level. 0 means debugging off, 6 means epic.
To simplify dialing, turn on Dial Assist and select a country. The number will automatically be formatted with your country code. Otherwise, dial \'+\' and the country code.
To call other Silent Circle subscribers, simply dial their Silent Circle subscriber name.
Adds \'+\' to form an international phone number.
Adds \'+\' or \'+1\' or replaces a leading \'011\' with a \'+\' sign.
Replaces a leading \'%1$s\' with country code %2$s and a leading \'%3$s\' with the \'+\' sign.
Adds \'%2$s\' to dialed digits and replaces a leading \'%3$s\' with the \'+\' sign.
Set this password to encrypt Silent Phone. You will need to enter this password to start the application. Silent Circle cannot reset this password for you.
Stop using password encryption of Silent Phone.
Set this PIN to encrypt Silent Phone. You will need to enter this PIN to start the application. Silent Circle cannot reset this PIN for you.
Stop using PIN encryption of Silent Phone.
PINs do not match. Please check.
PIN is too short. Enter at least %d digits
Wipe all data on Silent Phone after 10 failed passcode attempts
Unlock Silent Phone with your fingerprint
In order to use Fingerprint unlock, you need to first enroll at least one fingerprint.
If you have recently enrolled a new fingerprint, you will need to re-enable Fingerprint unlock in Silent Phone\'s passcode settings.
Reload Silent Phone\'s account and configuration data.
Select your phone number from a region and area
Phone number selection - server sent wrong data format:
Currently no area available in this region. Select another region.
Currently no phone number available, select another region or area.
Creating a new conversation requires network access so we can search for the other party. Try connecting to a network or disabling airplane mode.
Sign in to your Silent Circle account
Video is not available for this call.

Silent Phone has detected network trouble. This may affect your call quality. Try changing networks or internet service providers, moving to a place with more signal bars or closer to your wireless base station, or contacting your organization\'s network staff.
No call minutes used. Monthly plan: %1$d minutes.

plurals.item: You used one minute of your %1$d minutes.

resources.string: Always use media relay server to conceal remote party\'s location. Adds latency.
Network unavailable. \n\nEnsure your device can connect to the Internet and try again.
Please re-launch the app and login again.
This device is not known to the provisioning server. To re-provision this device you need to enter your Silent Circle username and password. \n\nTo continue press OK.
No installed activity available to handle selected action.
You have no recent missed calls.
Re-enable the Contacts application to use this feature.
Drag here to remove from conference
An account exists already - cannot create an additional account on this device.
Cannot make a phone call because the Silent Phone application is not available.
The recipient has requested that this message be sent again.
For added security, you have verified this message with the recipient.
For added security, verify this message with the recipient.
Saving this conversation will expose all of its messages to another application of your choice. Messages with an attachment or a burn notice will NOT be exported.
File no longer available. Please contact sender.
Deleting the conversation will destroy all of its data.
Leaving the group will destroy all its data on this device. To join the group again, you\'ll need to be added by another member.
This media is currently private. In order to proceed, Silent Phone must grant other applications access to the decrypted file.
Are you sure you want to establish new keys for messaging sessions?
Unable to launch system\'s ringtone picker activity.
There was a problem taking a picture. Please try again.
Recording is not supported during a call
Please wait until attachments are complete
To use this option, enable Location under device Settings. Location may be empty if only GPS is used.
The file you have selected is too large.
This will clear conversations, call history, and other Silent Phone data. The application will exit. You will need to log back in when you restart Silent Phone.
This device has been removed from the list of authorized devices so it will close in %s and all of the application data will be cleared.
This device has been removed from the list of authorized devices so it will close in %s. Please clear application data manually.
You have been invited to group conversation %1$s by %2$s.\nPlease accept or decline the invitation.
Changing burn time for group conversation will remove messages which are expired with new burn value.
Storage permission is required to view attachments and has been denied previously. It will be required to enable Storage permission in application\'s preferences under Settings > Apps > Silent Phone

Your organization imposes a policy of retaining data about your communication, however you have blocked Silent Phone from retaining this data. Communication is now prohibited. To restore communication either unset \"Block local data retention\" in Silent Phone settings or ask your organization\'s administrator to remove your data retention policy.

Conversation partner\'s organization imposes a policy of retaining data about your communication, however you have blocked Silent Phone from retaining this data. Communication is now prohibited. To restore communication unset \"Block remote data retention\" in Silent Phone settings.

The user to whom you sent this message has declined to communicate with other users who are subject to data retention. As your organization %1$s imposes a policy of retaining data there\'s no way to respect both of your wishes. Communication between you is blocked. To allow communication, you could ask that user to deselect \"Block remote data retention\" in his or her Silent Phone settings or you could ask your organization to disable data retention on your account.

The user to whom you sent this message is subject to data retention and you have declined to communicate with other users who are subject to data retention. Communication between you is blocked. To allow communication, you could deselect \"Block remote data retention\" in your Silent Phone settings.
The user to whom you sent this message is subject to data retention, however the user blocked the data retention functions on the client. Communication is blocked.

For your protection, we\'ve enabled blocking of data retention. If you are a non-organizational user this blocking is enabled by default. If you are part of an organization, your organization has blocked the use of data retention.
Tap the plus icon to call, text, send files, & more
Conversation is empty\nType below to send a message\nTouch phone icon above to call
Conversation is empty\nTouch phone icon above to call
Conversation is empty\nType below to send a message
Could not open the link. No browser application found.
Shows status of the conversation partner\'s devices
Shows the current group members in the conversation

The list may show a device more than once if the app was removed and installed again. To enhance security a new installation creates a new security setup. \n\nClick on the remove button to delete an old device.
The list may show a device more than once if the app was removed and installed again on the partner\'s device.
Buffer too small to store some data
Could not decrypt a received message
Found no own identity for registration
No registered messaging devices found for the user
Offered pre-key not found - unknown pre-key id
No session data for this user found
ZINA conversation exists while trying to setup new one
HMAC check of encrypted message failed
Incorrect padding of decrypted supplementary data
Not a real error, just to report that no staged keys available
Mismatch of receiver\'s long term identity
Mismatch of sender\'s long term identity
Expected length of data does not match received length
Expected device id does not match actual device id
Network error or server request failed
Some data is missing for this function
Value of an argument is illegal/out of range (internal error)
ZINA ratchet data is probably out of sync
Private and public key use different curves
Their identity key and our identity key use different curve types
The IV or other data length did not match the cipher\'s block size
Key size not supported for this cipher
Maximum members for this group reached.
Message has type group command but no data.
Message is group command but has no command.
Message is normal group message command but has no data.
Cannot store a new member data in database.
Group does not exist or is not active.
No vector clock for group/event pair.
Currently preparing and sending group updates.
A prepared change set is not available.
Sorry, you have hit the maximum character limit
Cannot open this file. It may be saved, shared, or viewed with another application.
Play sound when a new message arrives or a message is removed.
You may import the saved contacts at a later time. Use the contact\'s import functions and select the file %s
Check whether entered user name is correct.
Ensure your device can connect to the Internet and try again.
Sorry, this device doesn\'t appear to support SMS, so we can\'t send out an invitation.
Sorry, you need to setup an email account before we can send out invitations by email.
Sorry, the contact appears to have no phone or email, so we can\'t send out an invitation.
You are limited in your usage of Silent Phone. Visit the Silent Circle website and upgrade your account.
You are limited in your usage of Silent Phone. Visit the Silent Circle website and upgrade your account. \n\nIn the meantime, you can still receive secure calls and messages.
Your account has expired. Visit the Silent Circle website and renew your account to make secure calls.
You have run out of minutes. Visit the Silent Circle website and add credit to your account to make secure calls.
You have run out of credit. Visit the Silent Circle website and add credit to your account to make secure calls.
You are running low on minutes. Visit the Silent Circle website and add credit to your account to make secure calls.
You are running low on credit. Visit the Silent Circle website and add credit to your account to make secure calls.
To use Silent Circle\'s services, you must fund your account with a minimum of $5.00 USD. \n\nClick below to begin.
This call to an outside number cannot be placed because your account does not include Silent World service.

Please acknowledge the request in the next dialog to keep SilentPhone connected. If SilentPhone is not connect then you cannot receive calls or text messages. SilentPhone has an advanced power management if in standby mode and the impacts on battery lifetime are negligible.
Please provide an amount to purchase
Please select a card to purchase
Please provide an amount to purchase
Please provide correct credit card information
The card number that you entered is invalid
The expiration date that you entered is invalid
The CVC code that you entered is invalid
Please try it again. If it still exists, Please contact app provider.
%1$s will be charged to the credit card ending with %2$s
Click this button to continue purchasing
Please provide your card number into the text edit
Please select expiration year from drop down
Please select expiration month from drop down
Please provide cvc number on the back of your card into the text edit
Please click the save button to register your card to Stripe and save this Stripe token
Wiping data has failed - please uninstall manually!
Clear application data and log out
Recipient\'s organization has a policy retaining conversation data. Silent Phone is retaining this data and uploading it to recipient\'s organization.
Your organization and recipient\'s organization have a policy of retaining conversation data. Silent Phone is retaining this data and uploading it to your organization and recipient\'s organization
Your organization has a policy of retaining conversation data. Silent Phone is retaining this data and uploading it to your organization.
Message not delivered due to your organization\'s data retention policy
Message not delivered due to recipient\'s data retention policy
Message not delivered due to recipient\'s data retention settings (blocked data retention)
Redirect URI does not contain a query string: %s.
Redirect URI does not contain necessary data.
Server provided a wrong redirect URI: %s

HW device identifiers do not match: 
Stored: %1$s
Actual: %2$s 

Please uninstall and install the application.

Silent Phone does not initiate phone calls that require the device\'s phone application. \n\nHowever, Silent Phone monitors if you have an active call or if you receive a call while you are using Silent Phone. In these cases Silent Phone either manages the Silent Phone call or informs you about the incoming call using a notification tone.
Audio: to setup calls or to record audio attachments (if enabled).
Silent Phone cannot work without the required permissions, exiting. You may start Silent Phone again and grant the required permissions.
Silent Phone accesses the location to attach location information to a message if you enable this feature.
On user request Silent Phone can store or share attachments. This requires permission to access external storage.
Silent Phone accesses the camera to allow for capturing photo and video attachments. The camera is also used to access the video chat feature.
Store on your device certain details that can help when reporting issues.
Please connect to the internet and try again.
Error while reading encrypted log files.
Could not create temporary directory for decrypted logs.
On your request Silent Phone can store debugging information for reporting issues which requires your permission for saving these encrypted logs to external storage.
Silent Circle is a secure communications company offering mobile devices, software applications, and communication management services to the Enterprise.
Private, encrypted communication and secure file transfer to any device, for everyone in your enterprise.
Search for partners in your contact list, by email address or full name.
Tap the menu icon to access your Silent Phone settings, manage your account, & more.
Call, text, or send photos, videos, & more
Touch the plus icon to create new conversations, make calls, or search your contacts. In a conversation you can send audio recordings, photos, videos, file attachments, your location, & more.
Tap the call icon to make a secure call or video call to this person.
Hold the record icon and start talking to record a voice message. Release to send it immediately.
Tap here to send pictures, take pictures, record video, share contacts, and send files.
Tap the burn icon to adjust the burn time. This sets how long your messages can be read by the other person.
Tap the add to contacts button to add this person as a new entry to your address book or to associate this person\'s Silent Phone information with an existing contact.
Touch this menu icon to enable sharing your location with each message, to clear the conversation, and to see security information for the devices in this conversation.
Tap the add participants button to add participants to this group conversation.
Everyone in your contacts who can be reached securely with Silent Phone is shown right at the top. Contacts are matched by email and by Silent World phone numbers.
You have Silent World on your account. Select any contact with a phone number and you can make a non-secure traditional call.
Enter a name, phone number, email, or Silent Circle username and we\'ll try to find the contact. We search your device contacts and the %1$s directory.
Touch the dialpad to search for a number or to call a phone number directly.
Suppress notification sound for this conversation
You have a new group conversation invitation
No members in group yet\nTo invite someone into conversation tap the plus icon
No groups known on this device
Group already has more members than desired maximum
Could not update maximum number of group members
Maximum number of group members updated
Maximum number of group participants is 30
Minimum number of group participants is 3
Could not update group burn delay
Group name should not be empty
Group description should not be empty
Group with this name already exists
Maximum member count must be between %1$d and %2$d
Select group participants by clicking on contact items
Hold to record, release to send
